, will henceforth concentrated on ''strategic projects, in particular working on new products.'' Although Eric Schmidt is stepping down as chief executive, Google said he will take on the role of Executive Chairman, focusing externally on deals, partnerships, customers and broader business relationships, government outreach and technology thought leadership-- all of which are increasingly important given Google's global reach. Internally, he will continue to act as an advisor to Larry and Sergey Brin .
